import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import PostList from '../components/PostList'; import HandlePost from '../components/HandlePost'; import NavigationBar from '../components/NavigationBar'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import { getUser } from '../adapters/user' export default function HomePage() { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { import('../styles/homepage.css') // Get info from database getInfo() }, []) async function getInfo() { var user = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("userAuth")); const result = await getUser(user.userID) setUserInfo(result) } return (
{/* WRAPPER */}
{/* HEADER */}
{/* WRAP CONTENT */}
{/* HANDLE POST */} {/* NƠI ĐẶT POST DO NGƯỜI DÙNG ĐĂNG */} {/* --------------------------------------- */}
{/* RIGHT SIDEBAR */}
